Siege of Gondor: title=The Lord of the Rings Strategy Battle Game: Siege of Gondor

author=Matthew Ward<ref name=amazon>[http://www.amazon.com/Rings-Strategy-Battle-Siege-Gondor/dp/B0029N7XG0/ref=sr_1_1?ie=UTF8&qid=1316337922&sr=8-1 The Lord of the Rings Strategy Battle Game Siege of Gondor] at [http://www.amazon.com/ref=gno_logo Amazon.com] (accessed 18 September 2011)</ref>

{{disambig-more: '''''The Lord of the Rings Strategy Battle Game: Siege of Gondor''''' is a supplement for [[Games Workshop]]'s ''[[The Lord of the Rings Strategy Battle Game]]''.
The supplement was discussed in the magazine ''[[White Dwarf]]'', issue 291.

*[http://boardgamegeek.com/boardgameexpansion/84968/the-lord-of-the-rings-strategy-battle-game-the-sie The Lord of the Rings Strategy Battle Game: The Siege of Gondor] at [http://boardgamegeek.com/ BoardGameGeek]
